member.name: M:Hrm.Server.Data.DemoDataSetup.DomainName
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^((?!-))(xn--)?[a-z0-9][a-z0-9-_]{0,61}[a-z0-9]{0,1}\\.(xn--)?([a-z0-9\\-]{1,61}|[a-z0-9-]{1,30}\\.[a-z]{2,16})$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Zero-width negative lookahead.
○ Match '-'.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match the string "xn--".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9a-z].
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9_a-z] greedily at most 61 times.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9a-z] atomically, optionally.
○ Match '.'.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ 3rd capture group.
○ Match the string "xn--".
○ 4th capture group.
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9a-z] atomically at least 1 and at most 61 times.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9a-z] atomically at least 1 and at most 30 times.
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a character in the set [a-z] atomically at least 2 and at most 16 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Hrm.Integrations.Dataverse.Converters.DataEventMessageConverter.DateRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^/Date\\(([+-]*\\d+)([+-]*\\d*)\\)/$
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match '/'.
○ Match a character in the set [Dd].
○ Match a character in the set [Aa].
○ Match a character in the set [Tt].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match '('.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [+-] atomically any number of times.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least once.
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [+-] atomically any number of times.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically any number of times.
○ Match the string ")/".
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
